body: Yes. I was also checking this point. I think there is a bug happening between the Recipe and the runDaylightAnalysis components. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XlWIySAJgQjUdXE70HGJJlUXM8WmBdCLxCuvNKckCOCISaoV6lfbvDXMZOx6SNDSlSux3jMUZIUsubHSD7U91-3egHQUGTVZ/Capture.PNG) In the image you can see that the grid from the genTestPts is ok (inside the model) but the grid after the simulation is rotated outside the model. -A.
